nodes.text: Crothy was a location in the galaxy. Around 232 BBY, at the time of the Great Hyperspace Disaster, Crothy was dealing with an outbreak of fever. A patient being treated in a Coruscant hospital in the disaster's aftermath had been taking vaccines to Crothy, and inquired to Jedi Padawan Reath Silas, volunteering in the hospital, if anyone had reached the location and if the fever had been contained.
